meaningMnemonic: You can guess this is a noun version of the kanji because the hiragana sticking out of it isn't an う-related sound or an い-related sound. So, what is the noun version of <kanji>answer</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>answer</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is kun'yomi, but this is also the reading you learned with the kanji so you should be able to read this and then give your 答え correctly.
